com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform

Interface IReadOnlyDataStorage<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>>

  • Type Parameters:
    DESC -
    DATA -
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBeanStorage, IDataStorage<DESC,DATA>, IReadOnlyTupleStorage, IRWLockedTupleStorage, ITupleStorage
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeanStorage, JDBCTupleStorage, MemoryTupleStorage, RWLockedTupleStorageProxy

    public interface IReadOnlyDataStorage<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>>
    Provides read-only storage of data shared across one or more ISharedDataPlatforms. A single instance may host shared data for multiple platforms. As a result, an IApplicationDescriptor associated with the desired platform must be provided to the methods here.

    The storage must be connected to using the connect(IApplicationDescriptor) method prior to doing any reads of the storage. Storage may host data for multiple applications, so an IApplicationDescriptor is required when connecting.

    Once connected, data may be retrieved by name (shared data is assigned unique names within a platform), and the names of all shared data may be requested.

    Author:
    dawood
